QuestData.Title: Waste Not, Want Not
QuestData.Description: Reinforcements are great, but I don't see 'em haulin' any wagons loaded with ingots or timber.$B$BTake a look around, friend. Trees are in short supply, and the mines are overrun with Legion scum.$B$BI'm in a bad way fer supplies, and I'm makin' what substitutions I can, but it's time to start reusing what we can.$B$BThe southern edge of the Path o' Glory is strewn with the ruins of siege machinery. Some pieces of 'em are still usable. Feeling up to a bit o' a salvage operation?
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 8 pieces of Salvaged Metal and 8 pieces of Salvaged Wood to Dumphry at Honor Hold.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to find any usable materials out there underneath all the dust, ash, and char?
QuestData.RewardText: This is in better condition than I thought it'd be. Sure, it's going to take some time to work off all the rust, the char, and the like, but I'll not complain.
